page.title: 13TRANSPORT-NORTHGATE STATION
page.content: Newark Northgate{Station}is situated at the corner of Loncoln Street and Appletongate. The facilities are: signals and telecommunications room, ambulance room, porter's room, waiting rooms, booking office, passenger's footbridge, parcel office, W.C. block, refreshment machines, stationmaster's office and computer and tanoy rooms. The{employees}are 10 porters, 10 engineers, 4 supervisors and 2 ticket collectors. The most popular destination is London. Freight, passenger, engineering and run around{trains}pass through the station. Diesel trains need to refuel at night. Some trains pass through at 125 m.p.h. Approximately 200 trains pass through the station each day. Freight trains carry oil, cars, wheat and grain.
